# VEHICLE::SET_CAN_ADJUST_GROUND_CLEARANCE

## Summary
Set whether the vehicle will adjust its ground clearance as it moves at speed. This is always done for the player vehicle

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** canAdjust
